progetto.view.commandline.states

Class AbstractCLViewState

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.view.commandline.CommandProcessor
      • progetto.view.commandline.states.AbstractCLViewState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICommand, ICommandProcessor, IExecutible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChairSelectionState, ConfirmExitState, ContinueGameState, DefaultViewState, EndGameViewState, FrameSelectionViewState, GameTransitionState, PickDiceState, PreGameViewState, RoomsChoiceState, RoomsState, RoundViewState, ShowPlayerBoardState, ShowToolCardState, SocketRMIChoiceState, StateStub, UseToolCardState, WaitingState, WaitingTurnState

    public abstract class AbstractCLViewState
extends CommandProcessor
    Abstract class extended by every state of the command line view
